The <nowiki>[[DerivativeTeam|Derivative Team]]</nowiki> meeting are scheduled every two weeks. Meetings are held at <nowiki>[[irc://irc.freenode.net/ubuntu-meeting|#ubuntu-meeting]]</nowiki>, irc.freenode.net. They are open for everyone interested and/or participating in the <nowiki>[[DerivativeTeam|Derivative Team]]</nowiki>.
